entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 90 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening then light near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
